text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

──Tomorrow after lessons,
we have a photo shoot in the evening.

Yeah...! It's going to be a packed day tomorrow too,
we gotta do our best.

Yeah,
...Hana, are you okay?

Huh?
What do you mean?

Your health, your feelings, you know? With work and
lessons... you've been staying up late every day, right?
You're still getting used to the new environment...
...Could it be that I look tired?
No, it's not like that, but...

Oh, that's a relief. In that case, I'm fine.
──Besides,

Being busy is a good thing...
...right?

Good work, Hana.
Get some rest early and take care of yourself.

Haha, if I come back tired, I just fall asleep right away.
I can't stay up late or anything.

Well, as long as you're okay... But if anything happens,
don't hesitate to talk to me, okay? ──Goodnight.

Yeah, thank you.
Goodnight!

(...Oh, I got a message
from Haruki-chan──!)

"Thanks for working hard until late. Work comes first,
right? We can talk another time, it's fine."

"I might be late tomorrow,
so maybe we can chat another time."

"I'll let you know when I have some free time,
even though work is tough, let's both do our best, okay?"
(I wonder when I can talk to Haruki-chan on the phone...)
